headline: PG&E Sets Dates for Quarterly Stock Dividends
summary: On September 18, 2025, PG&E Corporation (NYSE: PCG) declared its third quarter 2025 regular cash dividend of $0.025 per share on the Corporation's common stock. The dividend is payable on October 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as of September 30, 2025.

headline: BMO Capital Maintains Buy Rating on PG&E Corporation (PCG) Stock
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the Best Electric Utility Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On September 11, James Thalacker, an analyst from BMO Capital, maintained a “Buy” rating on the company’s stock. The associated price target remained same at $23.00. The analyst believes that PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG)’s shares are currently perceived to be undervalued, despite […]
